name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today is the first anniversary of the Sitong Bridge incident.
One year later, Peng Zaizhou is gone, and so is Sitong Bridge.
But the seeds planted have taken root in people's hearts.
Salute to Mr. Peng Zaizhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 12, it was revealed that WM Motor became the first new energy company to go bankrupt. At present, WM Motor's system has been completely "suspended", and the car system, APP, and mini-programs can no longer be used normally.
Many netizens suddenly realized that the car could not be driven after the car company went bankrupt.
At present, WM Motor has officially issued an announcement that it will not lie flat and hopes to start self-rescue through various means.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@nezha_little @yangjianli001 If you still think this after a year, then it means that either you haven't paid attention to what happened in China in the past year.
Or your standards and expectations for others' sacrifices are too high.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Voice of America has collected some information about Mr. Peng Lifa (Peng Zaizhou)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Shenzhen user on Xiaohongshu found that a girl born in 2021 who he did not know had been added to his household registration for no reason when he went to handle the property transfer procedures. He called to complain but was passed around.
This sparked heated discussions among netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: More details about the man who broke into the Chinese Consulate in San Francisco have been revealed. The man is named Yang Zhanyuan, 31 years old. He has 5 replica guns at home, and a large whiteboard with hand-drawn maps of East Asia and Southeast Asia, with the words "liberate the mind" and "seek truth from facts" written on it, as well as Mao Zedong's works and a book on political assassinations. The roommate could not explain his behavior, saying that he was introverted and played games most of the time, but became strange in recent months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comment section, some netizens reminded that someone might have bought off the school district housing by buying off the insiders, and some netizens also said that their friends had the same experience and were randomly put in to avoid family planning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Caution] On October 13, an Israeli diplomat was assassinated on the streets of Xinyuanli, Beijing.
The murderer stabbed him several times and then left with the bag.
Judging from his appearance and the descriptions of people around him, the murderer was not Chinese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The diplomat has been sent for treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师

October 13, Shangqiu, Henan
Police cars honked their sirens to drive away villagers who stole corn

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
How do you evaluate Hunan TV's "When Marx Meets Confucius"?
In fact, Mao Zedong had already said:
If the Communist Party only wants to maintain its own ruling privileges and is getting further and further away from the people... respecting Confucius and offering sacrifices to Confucius, it means that your rule is no longer sustainable. The result may be the same as the Kuomintang, and maybe one day it will be driven to a small island by the Chinese people. Do you believe it? You don't believe it, but I do.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, a reporter asked about the "China will repatriate 600 North Korean defectors" incident. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that there is no such thing as "North Korean defectors" in China. It is reported that most of these defectors have lived in China for many years and have formed families with local people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens ask for help
On October 13, a netizen used Alipay to search for "new crown vaccination query record" and found that his vaccination record could not be found.
I asked my friends around me and they said they also had the same situation. I want to ask if everyone can't query the vaccination record in this way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, a government agency in Foshan was recruiting cleaners, requiring candidates to be under 35 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, at a lecture held by the Shenzhen Education Bureau, "The greatest significance of work is not the salary, but the training of the mind"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, the Israeli military asked Gaza residents to evacuate northern Gaza within 24 hours, presumably in preparation for the next ground attack. Hamas urged Palestinian civilians not to leave on the grounds of "false political propaganda by the Israeli side". The United Nations criticized Israel's request for people to withdraw to the south within 24 hours as "forcing others to do something difficult". Previously, Hamas said that Hamas and the Palestinians would not agree to leave Gaza through the humanitarian corridor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 13, the Xiangcheng branch of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China in Zhoukou, Henan Province, forged a signature privately and transferred the 100,000 yuan deposit left by the woman's husband who died in a car accident into financial management.
The bank said that this was the personal behavior of the employee. Even if the woman went to petition, the matter would be sent back to the bank for handling, which would be a waste of effort.
It is worth mentioning that in the Henan Village Bank incident last year, many depositors' deposits were privately transferred to financial management, and it was eventually determined to be the personal responsibility of the depositors after the thunderbolt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Facts have proven that no matter whether it is the real-name system or the security checks and registrations for foreigners everywhere, terrorists can still openly assassinate a diplomat in the most heavily guarded area in Beijing if they want.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, the verdict of the "Sun Zhuo Abduction Case", the prototype of "Dear", was announced. The court sentenced Wu Moulong to five years in prison for child abduction and Wu Mouguang to two years in prison for harboring. The result of the case caused dissatisfaction among the victim Sun Haiyang and the parents of the abducted children at the scene. They cried outside the court, "Two children were abducted for 14 years, and they were sentenced to only five years," and said they would appeal.
